cause.description: We are a generally anti-tobacco, anti-nicotine group that views marijuana as a medical drug not to be used without a doctor's prescription, and alcohol as currently being too easy for minors to acquire. 1. Tobacco should be outlawed. 2. Nicotine should be outlawed. 3. Marijuana should not be used without a doctor's prescription. 4. Existing laws regulating the possession and distribution of alcohol are not tight enough.
cause.mission: to promote the idea that neither tobacco nor nicotine should remain legal, that all usage of marijuana be restricted to strictly perscribed medical use, and that existing laws on alcohol be tightened.
cause.name: Anti-Tobacco, -Nicotine, -Marijuana, -Alcohol
